content.body: üëãüèª attendees: volunteering as a note-taker is relatively low effort, please do take a "shift" (as long or as little as you're comfortable). All that is required is to keep an eye on the transcription and make edits/fixes if errors come up.
also report back to #temporaldeadzone:matrix.org  any funny homophones or otherwise amusing typos
